entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:18 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High zero.
